alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 25 at 3:45PM PST until March 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 1-2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches possible above 3000 feet and 12 to 24 inches above 5000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 7 PM PST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
